Resource Profile: ILCore RelatedPerson Profile

Official URL: http://fhir.health.gov.il/StructureDefinition/il-core-related-person Version: 0.13.2
Draft as of 2021-05-02 Computable Name: ILCoreRelatedPerson

Israel Core proposed constraints and extensions on the RelatedPerson Resource

Usage:

  • Refer to this Resource Profile: ILCore AllergyIntolerance Profile, ILCore CareTeam Profile, ILCore Claim Profile, ILCore Condition Profile... Show 14 more, ILCore Coverage Profile, ILCore DocumentReference Profile, ILCore Encounter Profile, ILCore Group Profile, ILCore ImagingStudy Profile, ILCore Media Profile, ILCore MedicationAdministration Profile, ILCore MedicationRequest Profile, ILCore MedicationStatement Profile, ILCore Observation Profile, ILCore Patient Profile, ILCore Procedure Profile, ILCore QuestionnaireResponse Profile and ILCore ServiceRequest Profile

il-id-chkerrorRelatedPerson.identifier:il-id.valueIsraeli ID must be 9-digits with a correct check-digit at the end.
: matches('[0-9]{9}') and substring(8,1).toInteger()= (10-((substring(0,1).toInteger() + substring(1,1).toInteger()*2 mod 10 + substring(1,1).toInteger()*2 div 10 + substring(2,1).toInteger() + substring(3,1).toInteger()*2 mod 10 + substring(3,1).toInteger()*2 div 10 + substring(4,1).toInteger() + substring(5,1).toInteger()*2 mod 10 + substring(5,1).toInteger()*2 div 10 + substring(6,1).toInteger() + substring(7,1).toInteger()*2 mod 10 + substring(7,1).toInteger()*2 div 10) mod 10)) mod 10
